channel.title: You-scape/718/need staff/NEW SERVER
channel.description:
[b][u]INFORMATION ABOUT YOU-SCAPE[/u][/b] Will be givine some items away to new comers!! Home-[ftp=ftp://you-scape.freeforums.net/]http://you-scape.freeforums.net/[/ftp] Forums-[ftp=ftp://you-scape.freeforums.net/forum]http://you-scape.freeforums.net/forum[/ftp] *Please register* Webclient-***being worked on, had minor bugs*** Client Download-[ftp=ftp://www.dropbox.com/s/vc1hxvnod3mwvpq/you-scape.jar]https://www.dropbox.com/s/vc1hxvnod3mwvpq/you-scape.jar[/ftp] -100% uptime [b]Skills[/b]- Majority of all skill working! (hunter works but havent added the shop for it yet) [b]Dungeoneering works 100%[/b] [u][b]Not working skills-summoning,runecrafting, construction, Farming[/b][/u]
[u][b]What we offer for you?[/b][/u] -friendly eco. -once we get 20 members we will be looking for staff. maybe sooner -chaotics -dungeoneering xp (only one pvm as of right now) -customizable players (male to female) -rares (phats, weens, scarves..etc) -fight pits -kiln cave -kiln cape and fire cape -once we get 50+ players having a major drop party (few rares in included) -comp cape (cant receive it since some skills arent working atm) -friendly owners (bennyboii, Seppe) -bosses ************** [u][i][b]PLEASE LEAVE ME A FEEDBACK, WE ARE LOOKING TO IMPROVE IN THE FUTURE.[/b][/i][/u] I DO NOT HAVE PICS OF SERVER BUT PLEASE JOIN US FOR FUN.!.! WE ARE GOING TO ADD SOF AND LOYALTY POINTS SOON! (OPEN FOR SUGGESTIONS ALSO)

item.title: You-scape/718/need staff/NEW SERVER
item.dc:creator: @Bennyboii Bennyboii
item.description:
@Bennyboii wrote:

               [b][u]INFORMATION ABOUT YOU-SCAPE[/u][/b]

Will be givine some items away to new comers!!
Home-[ftp=ftp://you-scape.freeforums.net/]http://you-scape.freeforums.net/[/ftp]
Forums-[ftp=ftp://you-scape.freeforums.net/forum]http://you-scape.freeforums.net/forum[/ftp] Please register
Webclient-being worked on, had minor bugs
Client Download-[ftp=ftp://www.dropbox.com/s/vc1hxvnod3mwvpq/you-scape.jar]https://www.dropbox.com/s/vc1hxvnod3mwvpq/you-scape.jar[/ftp]
-100% uptime
Skills- Majority of all skill working! (hunter works but havent added the shop for it yet) Dungeoneering works 100%
Not working skills-summoning,runecrafting, construction, Farming

                            [u][b]What we offer for you?[/b][/u]

-friendly eco.
-once we get 20 members we will be looking for staff. maybe sooner
-chaotics
-dungeoneering xp (only one pvm as of right now)
-customizable players (male to female)
-rares (phats, weens, scarves…etc)
-fight pits
-kiln cave
-kiln cape and fire cape
-once we get 50+ players having a major drop party (few rares in included)
-comp cape (cant receive it since some skills arent working atm)
-friendly owners (bennyboii, Seppe)
-bosses

PLEASE LEAVE ME A FEEDBACK, WE ARE LOOKING TO IMPROVE IN THE FUTURE.
I DO NOT HAVE PICS OF SERVER BUT PLEASE JOIN US FOR FUN.!.!
WE ARE GOING TO ADD SOF AND LOYALTY POINTS SOON! (OPEN FOR SUGGESTIONS ALSO)

Read full topic
